alert.note: Alert for Del Norte Interior; Northern Humboldt Interior; Northern Trinity; Southern Humboldt Interior; Southern Trinity (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 10 at 5:24AM PDT until April 12 at 6:00AM PDT by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 6 AM TUESDAY ABOVE 2000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 2000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 7 inches in populated areas. Higher totals possible in remote backwoods areas. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Trinity County, Del Norte Interior, Northern Humboldt Interior, and Southern Humboldt Interior. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 6 AM Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state of California can be obtained by calling 1-800-GAS-ROAD.

area.areaDesc: Del Norte Interior; Northern Humboldt Interior; Northern Trinity; Southern Humboldt Interior; Southern Trinity
